normalized: even half-surrounded by the neo terras, the cordelian armoured knight corps stubbornly showed resistance.
cordelia sector standard time, 1:05.
the deadlocked situation had changed.
the cordelian armoured knight corps had thrown their defensive formation into disarray, and started retreating.
seeing that, neo terran commander kiria jeff had handed down the order to pursue them immediately.

name: kiria
normalized: the enemy are pulling back!
destroy them all simultaneously!
perhaps because she had seen that as an opportunity to win, she spontaneously stood up and fired off encouragement from the bridge.

name: kiria
normalized: pursue pursue pursue!
leave your names in history for the first battle to defeat cordelia's armoured knights!
ahahahaha!
however, her loud laughter was interrupted by the operator's continual reports.

name: operator
normalized: the enemy rear guard is approaching!

name: kiria
normalized: what?!

name: operator
normalized: number: 4.
1 of the knights is a new model!

name: kiria
normalized: no way, the onihime came?!

name: operator
normalized: no!
from the reports, it appears to be maya cordelia's personal knight!
having heard that name, kiria suddenly opened her eyes wide.

name: kiria
normalized: what's that girl…?!
raise a bloodbath and send her head to the onihime!
zwei sped along.
the knight's body looked like a silver arrow, piercing through the blackness of space.
three dark-green nulls followed it, making the lights from their thrusters shine.
they formed a rear guard and began to charge at the enemy pursuit forces, to aid their own units' retreat.

name: maya
normalized: zwei, i'll have you show them your power!
the neo terran pursuit unit was magnified on the front-view monitor.
maya regripped the control stick with her sweaty hands.

name: maya
normalized: commander picard, second lieutenant michael, second lieutenant logs, you can hear me, right?

name: maya
normalized: follow me!
while defending each other's armour, maintain speed, and charge!

name: picard et al.
normalized: yes, your highness!
the three brave knights following maya answered.
she accelerated zwei to maximum battle speed.

name: maya
normalized: charge!
commanded by zwei, which maya cordelia drove, the null platoon charged right into the middle of the enemy vanguard forces, which had started to pursue them.
perhaps because they hadn't even considered that the fleeing side would charge at them, the 3 blackmore-class destroyers at the front broke formation first.

name: maya
normalized: you strike a major hit like this, right, hime nee-sama?!
while speeding through the middle of the disordered enemy line, maya had weaved her way through the gaps between gunfire and fired her phaser rifles.

name: maya
normalized: one… two… three!
she was precisely hitting the only weak point of the blackmore-class destroyers, the rear engine area, yet not enough to destroy them.
the destroyers, which had been stopped one by one, ended up becoming obstacles to the corps following them, unable to even move from their spots.

name: maya
normalized: keep still right there!
now, next up!
maya threw the formation of the neo terran fleet's central corps into disarray right then and there.
and then, using the momentum from that, she turned her knight, and this time began to confine the left-flank enemy corps.

name: kiria
normalized: what are you doing?!
being disturbed this much by no more than 4 armoured knights!
in the neo terran flagship, urbano miralles, general kiria was enraged.
the annoying silver knight was leading the neo terran fleet around by the nose.

name: kiria
normalized: reorganize the ships that can move, and pursue her!
shoot down maya cordelia!
however, maya's zwei had charged toward the enemy corps on the left flank, with high mobility that surpassed kiria's tactics.
she was crossing through the middle of the confused enemy fleet with lightning speed, and throwing their formation into disarray.

name: major picard
normalized: maya-sama, it's those new-type torpedoes!

name: maya
normalized: it doesn't matter.
my zwei will take care of them.
everyone, take a range from the enemy ships!

name: major picard
normalized: yes!
maya never even flinched at the enemy army, who had fought back with their new goneril torpedoes.
on the contrary, trusting in zwei's uranos alloy armour, she took the shots upon herself, and protected the nulls that were following her.

name: michael ＆ logs
normalized: 「maya-sama!

name: major picard
normalized: are you impressed?
i'll give that claudio-class to you guys.
bring it down quickly!

name: michael ＆ logs
normalized: 「yes sir!
the nulls of second lieutenant michael and second lieutenant logs fired their phaser rifles simultaneously.
two beams precisely shot through the engine sections of the left-flank corps's flagship, a claudio-class cruiser, and forced it to be unable to fly.

name: maya
normalized: well done.
maya praised her trusty knights.
the enemy pursuit corps was already at the peak of disarray.

name: maya
normalized: that's it.
withdraw!
she ordered, having coolly ascertained the state of the battle.
a smile that even made one feel calm.
perhaps due to her elation over having accomplished her mission, a pale red tinge was visible on maya's face.
that made her royal beauty stand out all the more.

name: kiria
normalized: ehh?
is cordelia's new model a monster?!

name: operator
normalized: can't observe any effect from the new-type torpedoes!

name: kiria
normalized: then switch to phaser guns!
that new model won't fall due to the firepower of the gonerils, which aim for the weakness in the nulls' armour!

name: operator
normalized: r, roger!

name: kiria
normalized: what happened to the enemies' main body?!

name: operator
normalized: they're in the process of successfully retreating, breaking through the right-flank corps's vanguard in a shape that takes advantage of our disarray.

name: kiria
normalized: what's our damage?!

name: operator
normalized: 8th platoon, warships 1, 2 and 3 seriously damaged.
majority of ships cannot fly.
enormous damage to the forces on the right flank.

name: kiria
normalized: reorganize the ships that can fly into two corps.
pursue the onihime's forces.
the situation is still to our advantage!

name: operator
normalized: r, roge――

name: kiria
normalized: nuhh!
the instant that general kiria was about to adjust their positioning to chase after alicia and maya,
the hull of the urbano miralles was suddenly jolted.

name: kiria
normalized: what the?!

name: operator
normalized: ships being shot from the right flank!
damage superficial!
it's the enemy!
countless armoured knight units behind our forces?!

name: kiria
normalized: ridiculous!

name: operator
normalized: coming up on the monitors!
th, they're armoured knights!
shortly before that――
far behind the neo terran forces were the figures of several spaceships, speeding along and carrying three nulls.
chinook assault transport ships――developed in secret by alicia, they were transport ships designed to carry armoured knights to a battlefield at high speed.
1 platoon of three chinook units.
they moved instantly across distances that would be impossible with the flying ability of any individual armoured knight.
making use of those, alicia had gotten a separate corps of armoured knights to go far around the battlefield, and make a surprise attack from behind the neo terran forces.

name: alicia
normalized: now!
all units, change position!
surround and annihilate the enemy neo terran fleet!
in response to the surprise ambush, the armoured corps that alicia led spun around and went on the counter-offensive.
maya's newly-produced armoured knight zwei, which had stopped the pursuing forces in order to buy time, also began attacking the neo terran fleet again.

name: maya
normalized: hime nee-sama!

name: alicia
normalized: maya, huh?
thank you for your efforts in the rear guard role.
however, i'll be the flying ace for tonight.

name: maya
normalized: ufufu, i won't let you do that.
i'll have to have hime-sama see more of me with this baby.

name: alicia
normalized: hmph, do as you like.

name: maya
normalized: yes!
the cordelian armoured knight forces had completely surrounded the neo terran fleet at the bottleneck entrance of the kent asteroid belt.
in addition to that, attacks from the fixed guns that had been laid out in the asteroid belt were driving the enemy army even further into disarray.
having become disorderly, the neo terran ships were being destroyed one after another in a situation where they couldn't even cooperate with each other, and had no choice but resist on their own.
the current trend of the battle was obvious to anyone's eyes.

name: operator
normalized: 7th and 8th platoons: communications cut off!

name: operator
normalized: right-flank corps flagship listimo: destroyed!
destroyer fortissimo: under fire!

name: operator
normalized: we've entered the enemy armoured knights' line of fire!
they're coming!

name: kiria
normalized: kuhh!
the flagship urbano miralles was also exposed to the unforgiving attack.
general kiria ground her teeth in vexation.

name: operator
normalized: serious damage to propulsion systems 1 through 4!

name: operator
normalized: s, second wave coming!

name: kiria
normalized: kuh, this is…!

name: operator
normalized: it's no use!
a direct hit is approaching!
waah!

name: kiria
normalized: shiit!
onihimee!
it was a fatal blow.
a direct hit to the engine section.
intense vibrations suddenly assailed the neo terran flagship, the urbano miralles.
the power to the bridge fell, and switched to emergency power.
the lighting also switched to the red emergency lights.
the retreat message, which had never gone off before, resounded, along with grating warning noises.

name: kiria
normalized: dammiit!
the enemy war capacity is more than double what it was in the reports, isn't it?!

name: kiria
normalized: this is why you can't trust those guys from the intelligence bureau!
shit!
i will not die!
i won't die until i have my revenge!
the neo terran armada, which had completely lost their function as a group, began to flee one by one.
the second battle of cordelia sector――the outcome of the battle which would later be christened that was decided.
